      • getPreGuessMessage

        public String getPreGuessMessage()
        getPreGuessMessage() Get info message before a guess. The message contains the info about the possible number range (smallest and biggest allowed number in range).
        Specified by:
        getPreGuessMessage in interface MessageProvider
        Returns:
        Info message with the smallest and biggest allowed number in range.

      • getPostGuessMessage

        public String getPostGuessMessage()
        getPostGuessMessage() Get the message after a player's guess. The message contains the current game status and what happens next.
        Specified by:
        getPostGuessMessage in interface MessageProvider
        Returns:
        Message after a player's guess.
